downloadDescription: Enable access to Insider RDP and enable support for MMR.
detailsSection: This installer updates your registry to enable access to the Insider version of Remote Desktop and enables support for using MMR to accelerate VOIP calls.
installInstructionSection:
1. First, you need to install the RDP client if you haven't already. Download and run one of the following downloads if you are missing "Remove Desktop" in your start menu.
    • Windows 64-bit
    • Windows 32-bit
    • Windows ARM64
  2. Next, download this installer from the Download Center and run it. Step through the prompts to complete installation.
  3. To confirm that the installation is successful, close "Remote Desktop" if it is already open, then open it again. In the title bar, you should see "Remote Desktop (Insider)".
